reviewText: I am very pleased with this great DVD especially since it has great stories for children, and teachers, like me, can use it in the classroom.  It was a great buy!
great show ...I grew up on reading rainbow and now my sons get to see it too!!!! We need more kids shows like this again!
All Reading Rainbow shows are great in my opinion.  This product shipped quickly and was super affordable at new condition.
Great price, and prompt delivery.
excellent
A classic children's show with a lot teaching and info on children's books
so educational! dvd came in perfect condition.
Great musical related Episodes.
Over all, all the Reading Rainbow are just great. My Grandson and his friends just watch them over and over. Each time he watches on of the videos he learns something new

My one year old loves music so I took a chance and bought this. It holds his attention very well. I like that these episodes that I watched as a child can now be seen by my children. This is my favorite Reading Rainbow DVD and I highly recommend it.

I'm a music teacher and I have shown both episodes in my classroom.  Overall I enjoy them, but some parts of the episodes are drawn out and not very interesting for my students.  I often skip parts to keep their interest.

This is such a wonderful show, and the episodes on this DVD are great! We enjoyed the music and the book reading and review (Hip Cat is a fantastic book); the interview with jazz musician Joshua Redman is wonderful. My little one loved it; it was a great introduction to jazz for her. I definitely recommend this DVD and indeed this series.  It introduced us to some great stories for children. I bought this DVD along with copies of the two books that were read in the episodes, and it made a great present!  Educational and enjoyable!
perfect addition to my classes!
Great video to teach jazz and instruments. More than reading the story. Included are instrument demonstrations and suggestions for other books on the subject. An invaluable teaching resource!
I thought this would only be the two stories but they actually do a explanation/demonstration of improvisation before the story.
My students really like these!
Great
My granddaughter didin't like very much, we live in Spain, maybe she prefers another programs of music.
My students and I love Reading Rainbow
Absolutely love these episodes! My son loves the music, storytelling and seeing other kids create!! A great buy, 2 for the price of one!
Good purchase
The Kids love it.
Will forever be a classic!
